detail_desc: Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist, fly with a button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist, fly with a button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small frill trim, a drawstring at the top and a button at the cuffs.
Fine-knit cardigan in a soft cotton blend with an all-over print. Double frills and buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved dress in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed neckline.
Short-sleeved dress in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed neckline.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and leggings in soft, printed cotton-blend jersey with appliqués on the front. Top with press-studs on one shoulder, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and wrapover ribbing at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a straight-cut hem.
Leggings in soft, glitter-print cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a dungaree dress and long-sleeved top in soft cotton. Dress in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with appliqués and patch pockets at the front, elastication at the back of the waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back. Top in patterned jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a skirt in a double layer of glittery tulle.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a skirt in a double layer of glittery tulle.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and no buttons. Lined.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a tapered waist, covered buttons at the front, welt pockets and slits at the cuffs.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, patterned top with a press-stud on the shoulders. Dungarees with a print motif, appliqués, straps with a concealed fastening at the front, elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Jacket with a pile-lined hood, zip down the front and heart-shaped front pockets. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Long-sleeved dress in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded, ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded, ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem with a wide lace trim. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem with a wide lace trim. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Block-coloured jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Circular skirt in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Gently tailored jacket in a stretch weave with welt front pockets, a hook-and-eye fastening, and slits at the cuffs. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, superstretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight legs with creases that taper to the hem. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved dress in a short, fitted style.
Long-sleeved dress in a short, fitted style.
Long-sleeved dress in a short, fitted style.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and detachable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and detachable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a decorative, studded belt at the waist, pleats at the top and wide, tapered legs.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a lace-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Pin-tucks with lace insets at the front, an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring and bow under the bust and a gently draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

One-shoulder jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip in one side, a long sleeve and a wide cuff with covered buttons. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and tapered legs with a slit at the hems. Partly lined.
Jacket in nylon with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with raised details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with raised details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Key lanyard in fabric with a plastic fastener, carabiner hook and whistle.

Straight-cut top in woven fabric in a double layer with a wide flounce at the top.

Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a straight cut hem with slits in the sides.

Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a straight cut hem with slits in the sides.
Braided hat with an imitation suede band. Width of brim 8 cm.
Short-sleeved running top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Fine-knit, V-neck sweater vest in soft cotton.
